name: Made in Ohio
description:
MADE IN OHIO is an EPIC First Person game 👍

Play versus the most powerful meme and HISTORICAL characters of all times

You will be followed by faithful guide El GATO during you adventures in OHIO :)
NEVER underestimate him!
He is small but quite powerful

Unique Features

  • Exciting Gameplay
  • Strategical Moves
  • Boss Fights
  • Sliding SusMan
  • El GATO
Challenge Yourself! Can you survive in OHIO?
